item.title: The Joys of Subnetting
item.description: I have been studying for my CompTIA Network+ certification exam. This is the one of the early career trifecta (A+, Network+, & Security+) that I had been hoping to avoid. I was hoping that I might be able to find a cybersecurity track job without needing the Network+, so I could forego that exam entirely. Now the exam itself may not be a necessary for getting into cybersecurity, however understanding networking in general is absolutely necessary.
